Room.Name: Islandia Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Islandia Drive, north of the Darmanian Memorial.
Room.LongDescription: The Darmanian Memorial is a preservation for the ancient relics and other findings of an ancient civilization known only as the Darmanians (roughly translated by one of the mages with an expertise in ancient languages). The preservation is carefully assembled to allow anyone interested to look at and examine the various artifacts from the ancient society.
